name: spinynorman
text:
Interesting sidepoint - one of the Smothers Brothers once got sucker punched by Bill Cosby at the Playboy Mansion.

I swear to God this is true.

Apparently the Smothers in question had criticized Bill Cosby because he refused to take a stance on the civil rights problems of the era. Anyways, the two had exchanged words via the press, and then had a chance to come face to face at the Playboy Mansion. The Smothers apologized to Cosby, and said he hoped his show would take off, but what he didn't know was that Cosby's show had been canceled about two days before.

So, about two hours later, Cosby sidled up to Smothers and just decked him in the side of the head, bowling him over in front of a crowd of debauched celebrities, and then stormed out.

The irony and awesomeness of this fucking story is exponential as it goes on, I swear to God.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: HAHAHA that's awesome to someone who just found out that cosby's a rapist too.

name: tinhand
text:
I don't remember the "screw you guys" bit being there, which just reminds me of Cartman. But it was either that or "Yeah, and ya mum" and I guess Onstad made the right choice.
Also I don't imagine that Einstein would have a gut. It's great how Ray just seems to take whatever idea first pops into his head and then completely runs with it because he has the money (and therefore the power) to just f-ing run with it.
